meaningMnemonic: This is the noun version of the kanji <kanji>meet</kanji>, and it means a <vocabulary>gathering</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>meeting</vocabulary>, as you’d expect! It isn’t really used for the kind of meeting you have at an office, though. It’s more in the sense of a people coming together for a specific purpose, like volunteer <vocabulary>group</vocabulary>, or a birthday <vocabulary>party</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This has the same reading as the kanji you learned, meaning you know the reading!
